newsitem.title: USA: Verio acquires Internet provider Aimnet.
newsitem.headline: Verio acquires Internet provider Aimnet.

text.p: Verio Inc said Wednesday it had acquired Aimnet Corp, a business-oriented Internet provider based in Santa Clara, Calif.

"Adding Aimnet to our network adds significant strength to our presence in the San Francisco Bay area and further reinforces our commitment to be the first national Internet provider that's local," said Verio President and Chief Operating Officer Mark Johnson.

Verio, a national Internet services provider for small and mid-sized business and institutional customers, said Aimnet is the third Bay-area Internet provider to join the Verio group, which includes regional Internet providers in major markets around the country.
